description: Explore the intersection of NFTs and Digital Rights Management in the evolving digital landscape. Discover how NFTs are transforming traditional notions of digital ownership and DRM, offering new opportunities and challenges in creative industries and legal systems. Delve into the legal and market considerations, and the future prospects of NFTs beyond digital art and media.
keywords: NFTs, Digital Rights Management, DRM, blockchain technology, digital ownership, smart contracts, legal implications, environmental impact, creative industries, technological advancement
title: Exploring the Intersection of NFTs and Digital Rights Management
